description: In your Movement phase you can choose to use a Riptide Shas'vre's Nova Reactor. If you do, the Riptide Shas'vre suffers a mortal wound. Choose one of the following effects to last until the beginning of your next turn.
* Nova Shield: The Riptide Shas'vre has a 3+ invulnerable save.
* Boost: The Riptide Shas'vre can move 2D6" in your charge phase (even if it doesn't declare a charge).
* Nova-charge: The Riptide Shas'vre's ion accelerator or heavy burst cannon can fire using its nova-charge profile.
rules.name: Nova Reactor
